title: Clinical Tools and Resources
description: View helpful clinical tools and resources for physicians, nurses, allied health professionals, and other health care professionals. Learn more today.
main_content:

Clinical Tools and Resources
UPMC Content 2
The following are helpful tools and resources for physicians, nurses, allied health professionals, and other health care professionals.
Careers
:
Browse our career pathways, connect with us via Facebook, Twitter, and our Career Community, and search open positions.
UPMC Access
:
UPMC health care professionals have secure and easy access to the UPMC network and eRecord applications from anywhere that has Internet access
Physician Liaisons
:
The Office of Referring Physician Relations provides outreach liaison services to assist UPMC physicians and regional physicians in the western Pennsylvania area.
MedCall
:
MedCall is UPMC’s advanced physician-to-physician resource for all aspects of referrals, consults, and patient transfers.
UPMC Digital Pathology Portal
:
Our digital portal gives you a valuable second opinion necessary to be accurate and efficient in both diagnosis and treatment. Receive rapid consultations with no mail, courier, or inconvenience required.
Health Sciences Digital Library
:
The Health Sciences Digital Library (HSDL) offers a wide array of resources in electronic format, including medical journals, books, and databases. UPMC personnel can access the digital library when they are on the UPMC network or remotely via MyApps.
University of Pittsburgh Health Sciences Calendar of Events
:
The Health Sciences Web Calendar is a listing of news, events, announcements and other information from around the Health Sciences Community.
PittMed Magazine
:
PittMed
Magazine is produced quarterly for alumni, students, staff, faculty, and friends of the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine.
Conflict of Interest Polices
:
Review current versions of UPMC's Conflict of Interest policies including HS-EC1700 and HS-EC1701.
